name: Buff Boi Cactus!
description:
Hosted by VGDA Kickoff GameJam with a theme of Artificial Life

A lone artificial cactus left wandering in a distant night, in need of sunlight to survive. Struggle to journey and with light to survive his artificial plant.

Controller; movement and space bar

Developer note, there is no credit or ending

Developed by 5 team members;

Chi Ngo, Artist/Creative Director/ Level Design/Trying my best(Well all of us did XD)

Alex Chheng, Programmer/Sourcetree manager

Ariel Nam, Programmer

Leilani Takata, Artist/Character Designer

Kris Kath, Sound/Programmer/Level Design
